snippet.title: Space Station Designer - Gameplay Trailer December 2020
snippet.description:
Space Station Designer is a construction and management game that puts you in charge of creating and expanding a network of orbital outposts in Earth and Lunar orbits.

The game is under heavy development, and there's a playable build available for free at itch.io!

Main product page: https://spacestationdesigner.com/
Playable build: https://polar-motion.itch.io/space-station-designer-playable-alpha
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1447650/Space_Station_Designer/
